system.description:
When you directly engage a threat by heading directly into danger withour regard for your own safety, roll with Savior instead of Danger. On a 6-, your focused attack leaves someone in grave danger; the GM will tell you what it takes to keep them safe.

When you directly engage a threat, roll + Savior.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Mark Potential and the GM makes a move.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.ychaHSFqGy2SK7d7]{trade blows} and pick one.

success.value:
